scripts.debug: echo '=== PATH DEBUGGING ===' && echo 'Project root: $(pwd)' && echo 'Node version: $(node -v)' && echo 'NPM version: $(npm -v)' && echo '' && echo 'Listing client/src/components:' && ls -la client/src/components | grep -i errorboundary && echo '' && echo 'Checking file existence:' && [ -f "client/src/components/ErrorBoundary.tsx" ] && echo 'ErrorBoundary.tsx FOUND' || echo 'ErrorBoundary.tsx MISSING' && echo '' && echo 'Running build...' && vite build
